snippet: Advocacy groups have appealed a judge's ruling that denied them access to police records of license plate scans in Los Angeles, saying they are crucial to understanding the scope of government surveillance....

headline.print_headline: Groups Appeal for Release of License Plate Scans
headline.main: Groups Appeal for Release of License Plate Scans

lead_paragraph: Advocacy groups have appealed a judge's ruling that denied them access to police records of license plate scans in Los Angeles, saying they are crucial to understanding the scope of government surveillance.
